headline: Is Procter & Gamble Now a Value Opportunity After the 2025 Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering if Procter & Gamble is quietly turning into a value opportunity, or if the market is right to cool on this consumer staples giant, this article will walk you through the numbers in plain English. The stock has slipped recently, with the share price down 3.2% over the last week and 13.6% year to date, even though long term holders are still sitting on gains of 19.1% over five years. That pullback has come as investors reassess steady, defensive names in a market that has...
